page.title: 04HOME LIFE
page.content: A TYPICAL FAMILY DAY In our family there are two children and two parents.We live in a house in a house in the middle of West Huntspill village.My day starts at about 7.00 a.m.When I wake up,I like to read for about half an hour.My mum's alarm clock rings at half past seven in the morning.My mum comes in to say good morning and to tell myself and my sister to get out of bed.We go down stairs to have breakfast and we help mum put the plates out on the table.Our cat comes running into the kitchen when she hears us come down stairs,she meouws loudly asking for her food ,we give her meat and milk. For breakfast,we eat cereal with milk and sugar and toast and jam.My sister and I drink fruit juice and my mum and dad drink tea.
